alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 6:01PM AKST until February 22 at 4:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKST TUESDAY FROM KENAI TO NIKISKI... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Highest additional amounts near Nikiski. * WHERE...From Clam Gulch northward. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will linger along the Inlet is from Kenai to Nikiski, while areas to the south and east mix with or change to rain this evening. Highest snow totals will be in the Nikiski area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
